languages.text: {n}Обычный деловой шум мостика нарушают звуки раздраженных голосов. Громче всех звучит голос Абеляра:{/n} "Это не офицерский состав, а капризные детишки аристократии на выгуле. Объяснитесь, лейтенант!"

{n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"
languages.original_text: {n}Обычный деловой шум мостика нарушают звуки раздраженных голосов. Громче всех звучит голос Абеляра:{/n} "Это не офицерский состав, а капризные детишки аристократии на выгуле. Объяснитесь, лейтенант!"

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}舰桥惯常的声音突然被愤怒的声音盖过，其中阿贝拉德的怒吼声最为响亮。{/n}“这可不是一名军官该做的事情！这简直是被惯坏了的千金小姐在胡作非为！解释一下这是怎么回事，中尉！”
languages.original_text: {n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥惯常的声音突然被愤怒的声音盖过，其中阿贝拉德的怒吼声最为响亮。{/n}“这可不是一名军官该做的事情！这简直是被惯坏了的千金小姐在胡作非为！解释一下这是怎么回事，中尉！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los sonidos cotidianos del puente se interrumpen por un griterío furioso. La voz de Abelard destaca entre las demás:{/n} «¡Esta conducta no es apropiada para una oficial! ¡Es lo que haría una niñata noble en plena juerga! ¡Explíquese, teniente!».
languages.original_text: {n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los sonidos cotidianos del puente se interrumpen por un griterío furioso. La voz de Abelard destaca entre las demás:{/n} «¡Esta conducta no es apropiada para una oficial! ¡Es lo que haría una niñata noble en plena juerga! ¡Explíquese, teniente!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}日常的なブリッジの音が、怒りに満ちたアベラルドの声によってかき消される。その声は、かなりの大声だった。{/n}「このようなこと、士官の振る舞いではない！これは、遊び半分のハイボーンの戯れだ！説明しろ、副官！」
languages.original_text: {n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}日常的なブリッジの音が、怒りに満ちたアベラルドの声によってかき消される。その声は、かなりの大声だった。{/n}「このようなこと、士官の振る舞いではない！これは、遊び半分のハイボーンの戯れだ！説明しろ、副官！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die alltäglichen Geräusche der Brücke werden von zornigen Stimmen gestört. Abelards Stimme ist die lauteste von allen:{/n} "Dieses Verhalten ist eines Offiziers unwürdig! So verhält sich eine adlige Göre, die sich einen Scherz erlaubt! Was soll das, Lieutenant?!"
languages.original_text: {n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alltäglichen Geräusche der Brücke werden von zornigen Stimmen gestört. Abelards Stimme ist die lauteste von allen:{/n} "Dieses Verhalten ist eines Offiziers unwürdig! So verhält sich eine adlige Göre, die sich einen Scherz erlaubt! Was soll das, Lieutenant?!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les bruits habituels du pont sont interrompus par des éclats de voix rageurs, à commencer par celle d'Abélard :{/n} « Votre comportement est indigne d'un officier ! Cessez vos enfantillages immédiatement et expliquez-vous, lieutenante ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les bruits habituels du pont sont interrompus par des éclats de voix rageurs, à commencer par celle d'Abélard :{/n} « Votre comportement est indigne d'un officier ! Cessez vos enfantillages immédiatement et expliquez-vous, lieutenante ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın sesi öne çıkmakla birlikte öfkeli sesler, köprünün sükunetini bozuyor.{/n} "Bu yaptığınız bir subaya yaraşmaz! Ancak bir züppenin muzipliğidir! Derhâl izah edin Teğmen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The everyday sounds of the bridge are disrupted by voices raised in anger, Abelard's voice the loudest of all:{/n} "This is not the conduct of an officer! These are the antics of a highborn brat out on a lark! Explain yourself, Lieutenant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın sesi öne çıkmakla birlikte öfkeli sesler, köprünün sükunetini bozuyor.{/n} "Bu yaptığınız bir subaya yaraşmaz! Ancak bir züppenin muzipliğidir! Derhâl izah edin teğmen!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
